programme.title: The Kill List
programme.desc: Selepas mengetahui siapa yang membunuh ibu bapanya, seorang pembunuh upahan berhasrat untuk membalas dendam berdarah, manakala pada masa yang organisasi dimana dia bekerja berusaha menjejakinya

programme.title: Sacred Riana 2: Bloody Mary
programme.desc: Riana ke asrama sekolah Elodia dengan harapan dapat mencari anak patung Riani yang hilang. Para pelajar di situ sering melakukan ritual dengan cermin, iaitu Bloody Mary. Ia yang pada asalnya hanya untuk menakutkan pelajar baru, bertukar menjadi bencana apabila roh cuba mencederakan pelajar. Anak patung Riani didakwa sebagai dalang di sebalik bencana ini. Riana terperangkap dalam dilema antara membawa balik anak patungnya, atau mencari jawapan kepada pelbagai ketakutan yang berlaku.

programme.title: Janet : Sumpahan Terlarang
programme.desc: Julia adalah gadis Sarawak yang pergi ke Kuala Lumpur untuk merancang perkahwinannya Farid. Tetapi dia secara tidak sedar menggunakan jepit rambut milik Janet, yang telah menjadi korban ritual dalam membina jambatan.

programme.title: Rumah Pasung
programme.desc: Ryan, Sultan dan Mayang merupakan krew program tv tersebut. Suatu hari Ryan terpaksa menghadiri pengebumian bapa kandungnya. Ibu bapa Ryan membongkar masa lalu Ryan. Ryan anak angkat. Ayah Ryan meninggalkan sebuah rumah untuknya.

programme.title: Khun Pan 2
programme.desc: Cerita ini mengisahkan tentang seorang pegawai polis bernama Khun Phan dalam Perang Dunia Kedua. Dia menjalankan misi penyamaran untuk menumpaskan seorang gabenor di sebuah pulau yang semua orang di sana dianggap penyamun.

programme.title: Raging Phoenix
programme.desc: Sekumpulan penjahat menculik dan membunuh wanita di sekitar Thailand. Sanim dan rakan-rakannya, setelah orang tersayang diculik, telah bergabung untuk memecahkan kumpulan penculik. Dalam percubaan penculikan yang gagal, Deu telah diselamatkan oleh anak kapal Sanim. Selepas mempelajari gaya seni mempertahankan diri mereka yang unik, Deu membantu memikat kumpulan itu ke dalam pertempuran epik untuk menyelamatkan wanita di seluruh Thailand.

programme.title: Before The Fire
programme.desc: Ketika wabak global melanda Los Angeles, bintang TV yang sedang meningkat naik Ava Boone terpaksa meninggalkan kekacauan yang semakin memuncak dan kembali ke kampung halamannya di luar bandar. Semasa dia bergelut untuk menyesuaikan diri dengan cara hidup yang dia tinggalkan lama dahulu, kepulangannya menarik sosok berbahaya dari masa lalunya, mengancam dia dan keluarga yang menjadi satu-satunya tempat perlindungannya.

programme.title: Morg
programme.desc: Pekerja bilik mayat mula mengalami penampakan yang mengerikan dari kubur, menyesakkan dia dengan penderitaan yang besar kerana rasa bersalah yang perlu dia bayar.

programme.title: Rumah Pasung
programme.desc: Ryan, Sultan dan Mayang merupakan krew program tv tersebut. Suatu hari Ryan terpaksa menghadiri pengebumian bapa kandungnya. Ibu bapa Ryan membongkar masa lalu Ryan. Ryan anak angkat. Ayah Ryan meninggalkan sebuah rumah untuknya.

programme.title: Pendekar Sakti
programme.desc: Sakti belajar ilmu persilatan dengan bapanya Mahaguru Buana. Selain itu, Dadah dan Dalang juga menjadi murid kepada Mahaguru Buana. Setelah tamat perguruan, ketiga-tiga pendekar ini membawa haluan masing-masing. Sakti keluar mengembara untuk mencari bapa saudaranya, Dadah pergi menuntut ilmu dengan mahaguru lain. Malangnya Dalang hanyut dalam ketamakan harta dan kuasa sehingga sanggup membunuh Mahaguru Buana. Apabila Sakti pulang, Dalang membuat fitnah dengan mengatakan kematian Mahaguru Buana adalah angkara Dadah. Sakti bersumpah untuk menuntut bela di atas kematian bapanya.

programme.title: Lanang Sejagat
programme.desc: Sitara ingin mencari pembunuh bapanya yang bernama Datuk Merah. Dalam perjalanan, dia diserang oleh sekumpulan penjahat tetapi diselamatkan oleh seorang pendekar buta bernama Kasa. Kasa memberitahu Sitara bahawa Datuk Merah telah mati. Sitara terpaksa bermalam di rumah Kasa. Ketika itulah Penghulu mengarahkan orang-orangnya berbuat baik dengan ibu Sitara yang bernama Melati dan menghantar banyak makanan. Sekembalinya Sitara ke rumah, dia berjumpa Penghulu yang meminta pertolongannya untuk membunuh Lanang Sejagat seorang pendekar yang baru muncul di kampung mereka. Suatu hari, pendekar buta Kasa dan anak perempuannya Delima berkunjung ke kampung Sitara. Ketika di rumah Sitara, terbongkarlah rahsia bahawa Kasa sebenarnya adalah Datuk Merah.

programme.title: Siti Zubaidah
programme.desc: Apabila seorang rakyatnya dihukum penjara seumur hidup atas kesalahan menipu, Kerajaan Tartar telah mengisytiharkan perang terhadap negeri Kembayat Negara yang diperintah oleh Sultan Zainal Abidin. Apabila perang meletus, kerajaan Tartar berjaya menakluk Kembayat Negara serta menangkap baginda sultan. Siti Zubaidah, isteri kepada baginda sultan merancang untuk membebaskan suaminya daripada tahanan serta menyerang kerajaan Tartar dengan bantuan kerajaan Yunan.

programme.title: Semerah Cindai
programme.desc: Kelana mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Mahaguru Buana untuk membalas dendam kepada orang-orang yang membunuh kedua ibu bapanya. Selepas tamat perguruan, Kelana bertemu dengan seorang lelaki tua bernama Bagok, seorang pemabuk dan kaki judi. Dia mempunyai seorang anak gadis bernama Atma. Tanpa disedari Kelana, Bagok adalah salah seorang penyamun yang membunuh ibu bapanya.

programme.title: Jambatan Maut
programme.desc: Untuk mempertahankan maruah diri daripada diganggu Haron, Hamidah telah mengambil keputusan untuk terjun ke dalam sungai dari sebuah jambatan. Dia kemudiannya dibawa arus deras dan hilang entah ke mana walaupun seorang lelaki bernama Ibrahim cuba menolongnya. Ibrahim yang dihalau keluar oleh bapanya tinggal di pondok berhampiran dengan jambatan di mana Hamidah terjun ke dalam sungai. Sedang Ibrahim mengarang lagu, Hamidah telah datang kepadanya dan mula timbul bibit-bibit cinta antara mereka. Hamidah juga memberitahu kepada Ibrahim bahawa dia ingin menghukum Haron dan rakan-rakannya yang sering mengancam keamanan kampung.

programme.title: Putera Sangkar Maut
programme.desc: Sultan sering menyamar sebagai peminta sedekah untuk melihat sikap rakyat jelatanya dengan lebih dekat. Pada suatu hari, Sultan telah membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin dengan seorang gadis bernama Nilam dan mengahwinkan kakak Nilam yang bernama Dian dengan Mamanda Menteri. Dian enggan berkahwin dengan Mamanda Menteri kerana dia ingin menjadi isteri Sultan. Namun atas nasihat kekasihnya Panglima Jahang, Dian berkahwin dengan Mamanda Menteri sebagai satu helah untuk menggulingkan pemerintahan Sultan.

programme.title: Panggilan Pulau
programme.desc: Percintaan antara Zulkifli dan Jelita mendapat tentangan daripada Johan yang merupakan abang kepada Jelita. Akibat sering dihina kerana tidak memiliki harta, Zulkifli membawa diri dan menjadi kelasi kapal dengan bantuan Umar dan Ramlee. Kehadiran Zulkifli di kapal itu tidak disenangi oleh Kapten dan dua orang kanannya, Musa dan Shukur. Pada suatu hari, kapal yang dinaiki Zulkifli telah karam di lautan dan dia terdampar di sebuah pulau yang bernama Kezambo. Apabila Zulkifli sedar yang dia kini berada di Pulau Kezambo, dia meminta izin kepada penghulu untuk mencari harta karun yang tersimpan di pulau itu.

programme.title: Kami
programme.desc: Dua sahabat keluar mencari rezeki yang lebih baik di bandar melalui pelbagai dugaan kehidupan bersama. Tookoo yang berhasrat ingin menjadi seorang penyanyi lari daripada rumah untuk bebas dari keluarganya. Din pula yang masih budak, sanggup melakukan apa sahaja demi sesuap nasi. Persahabatan yang terjalin makin erat sambil mereka mengharungi liku kehidupan.

programme.title: Gemilang
programme.desc: Julia merupakan seorang penyanyi yang mencapai kejayaan di atas sokongan seorang hartawan bernama Razlan. Rita, teman baik Julia pula merupakan seorang artis terkenal dan menganggap Julia sebagai sumber inspirasinya. Julia merasakan keselamatan dirinya terancam apabila gerak-gerinya sering diawasi oleh seorang lelaki misteri.

programme.title: Bintang Pujaan
programme.desc: Perhubungan cinta antara Rina dan Hassan bersemarak kembali apabila mereka bertemu di kelab malam sehingga membawa ke jinjang pelamin dan mendapat seorang anak. Rina menjadi suri rumahtangga dan meninggalkan pekerjaannya sebagai penyanyi. Kepincangan keluarga dan perubahan hidup berlaku apabila Hassan tercedera dan tidak dapat meneruskan Peterman. Rina kembali ke dunia kelab malam walaupun tidak mendapat restu Hassan dan mula bersikap angkuh dan melupakan tanggungjawabnya.

programme.title: Getaran
programme.desc: Awie memiliki sebuah bengkel di sebuah kawasan setinggan. Dalam masa yang sama, di kawasan itu terdapat satu kumpulan muzik yang dianggotai oleh sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka kumpulan Kristal. Awie ingin mengetengahkan bakat mereka namun satu insiden telah berlaku ketika dia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Mona yang mengakibatkan dirinya hilang ingatan. Dapatkah Mona memulihkan ingatan Awie dan menyambung perjuangannya bersama kumpulan Kristal?

programme.title: Kolej 56
programme.desc: Berdepan jurang kefahaman, Rosman harus mencari jalan bagaimana untuk bersama gadis yang dicintainya. Menuntut pelajaran di sebuah kolej swasta, Rosman menjalin persahabatan bersama Roslan, Rosli dan Tengku Kamil. Golongan kelas yang berbeza tidak menghalang mereka untuk bersahabat. Satu kejadian telah menemukan Roslan bersama Mawar. Perasaan cinta mula berputik namun berdepan kesukaran kerana berbeza kepercayaan.

programme.title: Shakilla
programme.desc: Pasangan penyanyi popular, Ray dan Yasmin mengikat kontrak dengan sebuah hotel terkemuka. Ray sering diganggu peminatnya, Shakila yang tidak pernah bersua muka dengannya. Gangguan Shakila itu memberi ilham kepada Ray untuk menggubah sebuah lagu. Perubahan sikap Ray telah menimbulkan rasa cemburu Yasmin sehingga mendorongnya untuk membunuh Shakila.

programme.title: Kami
programme.desc: Dua sahabat keluar mencari rezeki yang lebih baik di bandar melalui pelbagai dugaan kehidupan bersama. Tookoo yang berhasrat ingin menjadi seorang penyanyi lari daripada rumah untuk bebas dari keluarganya. Din pula yang masih budak, sanggup melakukan apa sahaja demi sesuap nasi. programme.title: Shakilla
programme.desc: Pasangan penyanyi popular, Ray dan Yasmin mengikat kontrak dengan sebuah hotel terkemuka. Ray sering diganggu peminatnya, Shakila yang tidak pernah bersua muka dengannya. Gangguan Shakila itu memberi ilham kepada Ray untuk menggubah sebuah lagu. Perubahan sikap Ray telah menimbulkan rasa cemburu Yasmin sehingga mendorongnya untuk membunuh Shakila.

programme.title: Marah - Marah Sayang
programme.desc: Tiga jejaka yang cintakan muzik terpaksa dilepaskan dari kerja masing-masing kerana asyik leka dibuai irama ketika sedang bekerja yang menyebabkan ketidakselesaan orang lain. Rostam, Roslan dan Rosdin mula jatuh cinta terhadap tiga anak dara yang cantik namun Salina, Sarina dan Satina menolak cinta mereka. Pelbagai usaha telah dilakukan oleh mereka dan akhirnya mereka berjaya mengahwini gadis-gadis pilihan mereka itu. Syarat-syarat telah diberi jika ingin berkahwin namun telah dilanggar, ini telah mengakibatkan perkahwinan mereka menjadi kucar-kacir

programme.title: Hapuslah Air Matamu
programme.desc: Kisah tentang Aini, seorang penyanyi yang berasal dari kampung yang mula menempah nama selepas menjadi artis rakaman. Bermula sebagai seorang gadis yang sopan dan berbudi pekerti dan turut disokong oleh kekasihnya, Adi sehingga Aini berjaya menjadi penyanyi idaman ramai. Tetapi, Aini mula lupa diri selepas mengecapi kejayaan. Dia kemudiannya diberi peluang berkolaborasi bersama penyanyi terkenal Indonesia, Broery. Setelah itu, Aini menjadi semakin terkenal dan dia mula ditawarkan dengan bayaran yang tinggi untuk persembahannya. Kejayaannya telah mengubah Aini menjadi angkuh dan sombong sehingga dia mula melupakan janji lama dan juga ibunya. Dihina dan dimarahi oleh Aini, ibunya pulang dengan hati yang kecewa lalu jatuh sakit. Dapatkah Aini mengubat luka itu?

programme.title: Dendang Remaja
programme.desc: Di sebuah akademi seni, terdapat dua kumpulan pelajar yang berseteru. Mereka tidak serius ketika belajar dan lebih menggemari muzik dari barat. Oleh kerana tidak mendapat bimbingan yang sewajarnya, para pelajar ini menjadi semakin liar sehingga menganggu ketenteraman.

programme.title: Tipu Kanan Tipu Kiri
programme.desc: Rudy yang berkahwin dengan selebriti superstar Wulan, mesti merahsiakan perkahwinan mereka kerana klausa dalam kontrak Wulan yang menyatakan dia tidak boleh berkahwin. Dia kemudiannya mendapat pekerjaan di sebuah syarikat dan secara tidak sengaja memberitahu bahawa dia sudah berkahwin. Apabila bosnya ingin berjumpa dengan isterinya, Rudy mengupah seorang wanita berpura-pura menjadi isterinya dan keadaan perlahan-lahan menjadi tidak terkawal.

programme.title: Aku Ada Kau Ada
programme.desc: Nordin Ahmad pelajar tahun kedua sering teringin dipandang cool sentiasa. Namun, setiap kali Nordin menjadi tumpuan, dia akan panik, mula batuk dan akhirnya muntah. Aziz pula, seorang pelajar poyo yang perasan popular, selalu menyakat Nordin. Tina pula pelajar yang baru bertukar ke kolej Nordin untuk 99 Hari Senyum, sebuah program khas untuk mengatasi sikap panas baran yang ditawarkan oleh Dr. Zida, kaunselor.

programme.title: Mawar Merah
programme.desc: Kartika atau Arti gadis Jakarta yang suka bersosial. Tetapi ibu bapa Kartika tidak suka perangai Kartika yang liar dan suka bersosial. Mereka memutuskan Arti akan dihantar ke Kuala Lumpur untuk dijaga oleh nenek Arti dan bapa saudaranya, Sofyan. Hubungan Arti dan Sofyan semakin rapat dan mereka berdua saling jatuh cinta.Sofyan pula cuba menyembunyikan perasaannya kerana tahu perasaan cintanya terhadap Arti adalah dilarang agama walaupun Arti juga mencintainya. Mereka berdua terpaksa menerima hakikat dan takdir percintaan mereka

programme.title: Ayat-Ayat Adinda
programme.desc: Ayat-ayat Adinda berkisah tentang Adinda yang memiliki suara merdu dan ingin menjadi anggota qasidah sekolahnya. Tetapi sang ayah, Faisal, melarangnya karena ingin Adinda fokus pada pelajaran sekolahnya.

programme.desc: 10 peserta dari daerah berbeza akan berentap dalam mengetengahkan Sajian Terbaik Sarawak melalui pertandingan realiti yang mencungkil bakat dan kemahiran anak jati Sarawak dalam bidang kulinari makanan tempatan untuk merebut kejuaraan dan dinobatkan sebagai Raja Nyaman!

programme.title: Pejalai Kamek Orang Ep6
programme.desc: Hosted and narrated by Tony Eusoff, traces locations & stories from people who have heard, experienced and witnessed events right from Brooke Era in 1841 leading up to Sarawaks independence in July 1968

programme.desc: Mencari Identiti, Melihat Realiti mampu membantu industri pelancongan tempatan terutamanya Sarawak untuk di aktifkan kembali.

programme.title: Joran Borneo Ep10

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep40
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Papa
programme.desc: A Korean talent agent arrives in America and goes through with a fake marriage to stay there. However, his fake wife later dies in a car accident, leaving him with her six children.

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: A washed-up former hit producer and a young man with stage fear while aspiring to be a singer head off on a road trip filled with music and jamming sessions.

programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: Yong Seok helps Jose to get home after finding she has fallen from her electric wheelchair. From then on, the two meet up more often and starts developing feeling for one another.

programme.title: The Wild
programme.desc: Woo-chul is released early for good behavior after 8 years in jail. His friend Do-sik invites him to join the gang but he wants to live an honest life. Can Woo-chul keep his hands clean?

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Escape From Mogadishu
programme.desc: The ambassadors from North and South Korea in Somalia must join hands to escape from war-torn Somalia.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: Highway Family
programme.desc: A grieving mother met a homeless young family taking shelter in highway rest areas when they asks her for money.

programme.title: The Devil's Deal
programme.desc: A national assembly candidate, a hidden politics powerhouse and a gangster rivals for a top secret document that will shake the nation's core.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri has the ability to see ghosts. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: Escape From Mogadishu
programme.desc: The ambassadors from North and South Korea in Somalia must join hands to escape from war-torn Somalia.

programme.title: Swing Kids

programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep1718
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4833

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep12
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep13
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2168
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep2
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan (Eric Tsang), actor Cheung Chau Wan (Jim Chim), gynecologist Fu Mo Sum (Wong Jing), feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung (Chapman To), and dance coach Charlie Lam (Det Dik) - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu (Richard Ng), who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives (Maggie Cheung Ho Yee, Yeung Sze Man, Monica Chan, Mak Ling Ling, and Jacqueline Chong).

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: The Lady Iron Chef
programme.desc: Beer girl and part-time model Ceci has terrible cooking skills. Coming from a well-off family that owns a big culinary business, wealthy SK meets Ceci in a gourmet competition held by his family's company. Despite their different backgrounds, Ceci and SK fall for each other. However, SK's dominating mother disapproves of their relationship. To win over her future mother-in-law, Ceci must beat her rival Jade in a gourmet showdown

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brothers accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Rogers family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack

programme.title: The Tag-Along: Devil Fish
programme.desc: When a man caught a fish from the lake and grilled it to eat, he heard a weird voice and saw a strange human face on the fish. Weird incidents occurred one after another, before a temple priest exorcises the malicious spirits brought on by the caught fish.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: Yuddy is an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to Philippines to meet with his mother, but the trip ended up disheartening him again.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Corruption was rampant in the Hong Kong Police Force in the early 1970s. Chief Inspector Lak launders drug money with three other police officers, and a young officer from the newly established Independent Commission Against Corruption division is determined to bring them down.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says yes. Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliff's ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled 2046 which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Japanese karate master and Diao Er, who has been expelled from his martial arts school, return to the school to kill the school master and his disciples. After the massacre, disciple Lei Ming embarks on a vigorous training regime and vows to avenge their deaths. A fatal battle is about to begin

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Fake Ghost Catchers
programme.desc: This delightful action comedy featuring international favourite Alexander Fu Sheng premiered two years before the American hit Ghostbusters was released. Is it a coincidence? You be the judge as you enjoy this amazing showcase of wushu and wizardry.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lins sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Fangs Of The Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: Temple Of The Red Lotus
programme.desc: Wang Yu plays a young guy, Wu, who heads off to Dragon Valley to meet his childhood friend, Lian Chu (Chin Ping), who was promised to be his bride. When he gets there, he finds out that the family of his bride might not be an entirely honest bunch of people. Wu wishes to take Lian Chu with him, so he has no choice but to fight against her family

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keepers daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Gossip Street
programme.desc: All neighbours gather to gossip in flat number 8 on the second floor of the Gossip Street apartment building! Most of the residents are common people from all walks of life and there is never a lack of laughter or sarcasm in the neighbourhood. However, when a local mobster wants to change the place into a gambling den, things get serious...

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighter's retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Trail of the Broken Blade
programme.desc: Chivalrous swordsman Fung goes in search of another swordsman on the run, Li Yue, in order to reunite him with his love. Though both men meet and end up being close friends, Li Yue did not reveal his true identity until Fungs life is endangered by a gang looking for revenge...

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bats knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: In attempting to rescue some innocent people, swordsman Chiang Tzu-chao (Fang Mien) slays the son of Tsao Kang (Wang Hsia), leader of the ruthless Crimson Charm gang.The enraged father promises vengeance on the day of Chiang's 60th birthday...

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gamblers apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: The Enchantress
programme.desc: Shot on the Shaws' lot in the final years of Hong Kong's greatest studio, The Enchantress tells the story of martial artists who disappear in the night! Intrigued, wanna-be detective/swordsman Feng Chi-wu (Mok Siu-chung) is determined to find out what is happening. But when Feng finds out that an evil vampire spirit (Wei Chiu-hua) is killing swordsmen, he's in for more than he bargains for... It's an outlandish fairy-tale and martial arts fantasy, where your fists and sword aren't nearly enough!

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: King Cat
programme.desc: The son of the imperial teacher is beheaded by Justice Bao for corruption. Infuriated, the teacher hires assassins to kill Bao, who is saved by Zhan Zhao. Meanwhile, a royal treasure is stolen while a murder takes place. Bao is ordered to solve the case in ten days and Zhan quickly sets off to investigate. Will they solve the case in time?

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up. Will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: The Bride from Hell
programme.desc: A young business man marries a pretty and much sought-after young bride, not knowing that she carries the spirit of a girl raped by her uncle and murdered along with her parents. Justice must be done, and it ain't pretty!

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: Recent college grad Jaime Reyes returns home full of aspirations for his future, only to find that home is not quite as he left it.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Attack Of The Weird Al-Osaurus! - The gang discover a camp run by Weird Al Yankovic!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep10
programme.desc: When Urkel-Bots Go Bad! - Steve Urkel enlists the help of our mystery solving gang.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep11
programme.desc: The Fastest Fast Food Fiend! - Scooby and Shaggy compete in a fast food eating competition sponsored by the Doc Tally restaurant chain.

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: The creator of a virtual reality world dies, leaving his fortune to the first person who finds a hidden digital Easter egg. A great contest ensues.

programme.title: Pokémon Detective Pikachu
programme.desc: Tim, son of missing detective Harry Goodman, teams up with Harry's partner, Detective Pikachu, to uncover a plot that threatens the Pokmon world.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry: Snowman's Land
programme.desc: It's time to chase that holiday spirit with Tom and Jerry! With magic in the air, Jerry and his nephew, Tuffy, make a snow mouse that miraculously comes to life!

programme.title: Lego Jurassic Park: The Unofficial Retelling
programme.desc: The ever charming and now slightly older Chaos Mathematician Dr. Ian Malcolm retells the tale of what happened that dreadful night at Jurassic Park.

programme.title: We Bare Bears: The Movie
programme.desc: When the bears' love of food trucks and viral videos gets out of hand, the menacing Agent Trout from the National Wildlife Control pledges to restore the 'natural order' by separating them forever.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Jack Black is Po, the unlikely hero chosen to fulfill an ancient kung fu prophecy in this delightful animation voiced by a star-studded cast.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Pos new life as The Dragon Warrior is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain determined to conquer China and destroy Kung Fu.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep51
programme.desc: Toto A Go! Go! - While the rest of Emerald City sleeps soundly, Toto takes a rescue mission into his own paws!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S2 Ep52
programme.desc: Cap'N Bill In "Going Nowhere Fast" - It's swashbuckling adventure on the high skies. Boy pirate Cap'n Bill's crew has been kidnapped by the Boolooroo, so he looks to Dorothy and friends to join him on the rescue adventure of a lifetime!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Beware Of Woozy - Ozma's potion of the month club package arrives and Ozma can't wait to try it! Unfortunately, Dorothy doesn't read the instructions before she spritz Ozma with the Perfume of Petrification.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Magical Mandolin - When Wilhelmina steals the Magical Mandolin, Dorothy and her friends have to get it back or Wilhelmina will use the Mandolin to put Dorothy in a trance and steal her Ruby Slippers!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Toto Unleashed - Toto is snatched by the Monkeys and taken to Wilhelmina, who enchants his collar and turns it from ruby red to a pernicious purple. Can Dorothy rescue Toto and prove love is stronger than magic?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Official Ozian Exam - Dorothy must pass the Oziam Exam to be able to stay in Oz but first she has to save Munchkinland from a terrible dragon who has taken refuge on the Sapphire City. Can Dorothy save the city and study?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Locket Locket In My Pocket - Wilhelmina finds a magic locket that allows her to look like whoever's picture she keeps in it. So she takes the form of Dorothy and misbehaves at the fair and now Dorothy must clear her name.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Mixer - The Lion is named King of the Forest now he has his medal of courage. Will his trek over water, darkness and spiders be too much for this scaredy cat? Or will he learn the real meaning of courage?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ojo The Unlucky - While making cookies Dorothy accidentally pours the Potion of Life into the mixing bowl, causing disaster! Dorothy must use the mirror to change the Potion of Life into the Liquid of Petrification.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Lion's Share - A love magnet is a great Valentine's Day gift but it magically makes everyone fall in love with Dorothy, overwhelming her. Could there be such a thing as too much love?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Rules Of Attraction - Dorothy and the gang take Ojo the Unlucky to the Land of Ev to reverse his curse. But too late they realise the origins of his name and they are plagued with the worst bad luck they've ever seen!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Brain Power Of Love - Dorothy and Ozma have lost their voices after playfully calling out 'jinx!' Now they must travel to the land of Jibber Jab and meet the Yakity Yaks for the antidote.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Jinxed - The Scarecrow just stammers and stumbles around the scrappy dressmaker, Patchwork Girl. So Wilhelmina thinks Patchwork Girl must be a witch and traps her to find the secret of stealing brainpower.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Rise Of The Nome King - The Nome King tricks Dorothy into using the Magic Magnifying Glass on him, and once he's big enough, he makes himself a giant who can take over Oz. So Dorothy will have to make everything else big!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep13
programme.desc: One-Winged Wally - Dorothy and her friends find a one-winged monkey, who has run away from home. Dorothy feels sorry for the monkey and is determined to get him his second wing so she asks for Ozma's help.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Wand-Erful - The Good Witch loses her wand and Dorothy takes a break from teaching Toto to 'fetch', to find it. Wilhelmina gets the wand first, but can Toto remember to 'fetch' or will his mistake come in handy?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep15
programme.desc: No Sleep Sleepover - Wilhelmina is mad she's been left out of a slumber party and tries to ruin it by creating a giant Pillow Monster. But the Pillow Monster attacks the party, and rampages toward Wilhelmina's castle!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Lion Catches A Bug - Lion has caught a 'bug,' so Ozma shrinks Dorothy, Tin Man and Scarecrow so they can enter his ear and remove the bug. With the bug gone, Dorothy inspires Lion to protect the Emerald Forest!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Tik Tok And Tin Man - Tin Man worries that Tik Tok will replace him as the mechanical man of the group. Tin Man decides that he should leave, but Dorothy, Scarecrow and Lion must convince him that he can't be replaced.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep18
programme.desc: If I Only Had Some Brawn - Scarecrow thinks that being super strong will impress the Patchwork Girl so he gets a magical 'Get Strong Quick' shirt that makes him a beefy hunk - but at the price of his brain-power.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Beast Royales - The Beasts Royale are going to perform but Wilhelmina is their number one fan and kidnaps them so they can only play for her! The gang must come to the rescue and get the band back to the castle.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Time After Time - Wilhelmina uses a magic hourglass to go back in time and try - over and over - to steal Dorothy's ruby slippers. But every time she gets close to the slippers, Toto thwarts Wilhelmina's plans.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Kitten Around - Lion adopts a stray kitten, but when Dorothy returns the cat to her family, they find that Purrville is being terrorised by a Rak! To make the town safe, Dorothy must find a way to get rid of the Rak.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Castle Sitters - Wilhelmina sends her Monkeys to steal the Great Book of Ozian Records so she can erase Dorothy from Oz history! But Scarecrow, Tin Man and Lion are castle sitting, and the Monkeys are in for a fight.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Stuck On You - Dorothy gives Ozma a 'Best Friends' necklace (half says 'best' and the other half says 'friends') that she found in her garden. But the second they put on the necklace, they're joined at the hip!

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: A loud-mouth FBI agent goes undercover as a beauty contestant to capture a terrorist in this hilarious action-comedy.

programme.title: Prancer: A Christmas Tale
programme.desc: The tiny town of Brightridge is in for a surprise as a reindeer and a plucky young girl work together to help her grandfather save his beloved store.

programme.desc: Little Red Riding Hood - B.D. Wong and Vu Mai lend their voices to this animated episode of Little Red Riding Hood, retold in a Chinese setting.

programme.desc: Hansel And Gretel - The Grimm Brothers' story of two hungry children and their encounter with a witch is retold with a Latino perspective.

programme.desc: Put A Ring On It / Come Fly With Me / Bubble Gum Crisis / Mousequerade - Tom and Jerry storm a department store after dark, battle for a bag of gumballs, and babysit a troublesome baby panda. Meanwhile, Jerry befriends a pigeon.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Museum Peace / Here Kite-Y Kite-Y / Street Wise Guys / Chameleon Story - Jerry helps an elephant escape from the museum. Hi-flying hijinks ensue when Tom and Jerry take kites to the park and disrupt street performers throughout the city.

programme.desc: Ya Win Some, Ya Luge Some - The Racers participate in the Wacky Winter Games and compete in the luge, ski-jump, slalom, and snowboarding events. The games culminate in a final competition where Dastardly and Muttley do a dance.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep2

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep3

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Easter Express - The residents of Easter Island celebrate an ancient festival with a Wacky Race. The Racers end up rousing a giant alien menace that awakens the slumbering Easter Island statues bent on conquering the world, unless Muttley can stop them.

programme.desc: Race-A-Lot - Medieval Camelot has never been so exciting, or so wacky!

programme.desc: A Magizoologist arrives in New York amid tensions in the wizarding world only to be branded as a fugitive as he tries to recover his missing beasts.

programme.title: The Waltons' Homecoming
programme.desc: When John Sr. is nowhere to be found, Olivia sends John Boy out into the night to find his daddy - a journey that will change John Boy's life forever.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep3
programme.desc: I Wish I Could Walk With Her - Ruby gets an intimidating wish about an extended Emerald family, rife with secrets and surprises. Will she and her friends work up the courage to grant it? Meanwhile, Daniel gets to work on the orchard and discovers a key to the past.

programme.title: Ruby And The Well S1 Ep4
programme.desc: I Wish She Would Trust Me - A wish about trust causes a serious trust issue between Daniel and Ruby, too. Meanwhile, Daniel learns secrets about his dad that he never knew.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Telepathic Tabby / Shoe-In / It's A Gift / Stormin' The Doorman - In an attempt to trick Tom out of food, Butch predicts the future. Jerry helps save a shoe repair shop.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Great Donut Robbery / Torpedon't / Billboard Jumble / Horticulture Clash - Tom and Jerry mistake burglars' loot for a bag of donuts. Tom chases Jerry through a series of surreal billboards, Spike goes overboard trying to make up for manhandling Tom.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Peter Imperfect - Peter and Dastardly are caught in the explosion of I.Q.'s latest invention. Peter loses his 'mojo' but Dastardly has absorbed Peter's perfection and refuses to give it up.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Yes, We Canyon - On vacation, the Racers competitive attitudes overwhelm each other and they end up destroying the Grand Canyon.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Roamin' Racers - Our racers take the roles of ancient Roman chariot racers during the very wacky version of the Roman Games.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Smokey And The Racers - The Racers race through the American Deep South until they run afoul of Dastardly's cousin, Sheriff Longarm D. Lawe. Captured by speed traps, the Racers are sentenced to 847 years in jail and must find a way to escape and finish the race.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Raceketeers - Penelope, Peter, Tiny and Bella take the roles of the Three Musketeers in a wacky and action packed version of The Man in the Iron Mask.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep23
programme.desc: Horsing Around - Julia and Sam help Elmo learn to ride a pony at a farm. When its time to ride, Elmo feels nervous. What if he tries belly breathing? It works.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep24
programme.desc: Move And Groove On Sesame Street - Its Dance Your Favorite Dance Day. Nina, who knows lots of dances from around the world, teaches everyone the moves to their favorite dance.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry: Willy Wonka & The Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry help Charlie attain a Golden Ticket and secretly accompany him into the Chocolate Factory to prevent one of Wonkas competitors from stealing a magic candy.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

programme.title: Blade Of The 47 Ronin
programme.desc: 300 years after '47 Ronin,' the battling Samurai clans still exist. A powerful force reunites them against a common evil who wants power for himself.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: A teleporting man finds himself in a war between other Jumpers and those who have sworn to kill them.

programme.title: The Enemy Within
programme.desc: The U.S. President is about to be overthrown in a coup- it's up to the US military's last loyal officer to stop the uprising.

programme.title: The Way Back
programme.desc: When an alcoholic former basketball player whose life has fallen apart reluctantly agrees to coach his former high school basketball team, he finds himself confronting his demons and journeying towards redemption.

programme.title: Richard Jewell
programme.desc: A security guard becomes an overnight hero after reporting the discovery of the device at the 1996 Atlanta bombing. But within days, his life is ripped apart as he becomes the FBI's number one suspect.

programme.title: Fall
programme.desc: For best friends Becky and Hunter, life is all about conquering fears and pushing limits. But after they climb 2,000 feet to the top of a remote, abandoned radio tower, they find themselves stranded with no way down.

programme.title: Easter Sunday
programme.desc: Stand-up comedy sensation Jo Koy (Jo Koy: In His Elements, Jo Koy: Comin in Hot) stars as a man returning home for an Easter celebration with his riotous, bickering, eating, drinking, laughing, loving family, in this love letter to his Filipino-American community.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: As war rages in Europe, a Nazi-scalping squad of soldiers known as The Basterds goes on a daring mission to take down the leaders of the Third Reich.

programme.title: Bored To Death S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Beautiful Blackmailer - Jonathan, George and Ray team up to retrieve a damning sex tape for a married man.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: A mercenary joins the fight against a horde of menacing creatures attempting to breach the colossal barrier.

programme.title: The Lair
programme.desc: On her nal combat mission across the rugged mountains of Afghanistan, Royal Air Force ghter pilot Lt. Kate Sinclairs (Charlotte Kirk) jet is shot down over one of the most dangerous rebel strongholds. When insurgents come after her at the crash site, she nds refuge in a long since abandoned underground bunker.

programme.title: Killers
programme.desc: An American romcom in which a perfect couple get into a deadly affair with their neighbours.

programme.title: The English Patient
programme.desc: A badly-burnt plane crash WWII victim reveals his involvement in a fateful love affair in various flashbacks of his past.

programme.title: Bored To Death S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lonely White Dove - Jonathan tracks down a Russian chanteuse; George gets in touch with his feminine side.

programme.title: Bored To Death S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Case Of The Beautiful Blackmailer - Jonathan, George and Ray team up to retrieve a damning sex tape for a married man.

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A group of men pull off the most sophisticated and daring Las Vegas casino heist ever.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: When a highly competitive money mogul finds his financial kingdom slipping, he turns to his 7-year-old daughter and her fantasy world of imaginary princesses for help.

programme.title: How To Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: Hiccup is a young Viking who defies tradition when he befriends one of his deadliest foes - a ferocious dragon he calls Toothless.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Based on the Broadway musical, a trio of black female soul singers cross over to the pop charts in the early 1960's.

programme.title: She's Out Of My League
programme.desc: In this outrageous comedy, Kirk, an average guy, can't believe his luck when the successful and gorgeous babe Molly falls for him.

programme.title: No Strings Attached
programme.desc: A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more.

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Stupid is as stupid does, says Forrest Gump as he discusses his relative level of intelligence with a stranger while waiting for a bus. Despite his sub-normal IQ, Gump leads a truly charmed life.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 1
programme.desc: The guys talk ticks, tricks, and antics! What's with Murr's fool proof plans? And Joe's crazy faces? And why is Sal always falling down?! Plus, see the Jokers' best bloopers, and learn all about the guys' annoying habits that aren't captured on camera!

programme.title: Friends S3 2
programme.desc: In a race against the clock, Ross tries to get the gang dressed and ready for a black-tie benefit at the museum.

programme.title: Friends S3 3
programme.desc: After breaking up with Richard, Monica uses her free time to make jam and consider insemination via a sperm bank.

programme.title: Friends S3 4
programme.desc: Ross panics when he sees his son with a Barbie doll.Phoebe poses as Joey's agent and gets him some good parts.

programme.title: Friends S3 5
programme.desc: Phoebe's half-brother visits, and they have trouble bonding.

programme.title: Friends S3 6
programme.desc: When Janice asks the gang if any of them have ever slept together, the friends flash back to a time three years before.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 7
programme.desc: The curtain goes up and IQs go down as truTV brings you 20 of the dumbest performers ever to grace the stage. You'll see a Nutella-covered artist, the longest (and worst) death scene in film history, and a Japanese game show you have to see to believe. Reviewing the performances is our celebrity cast, including Danny Bonaduce, Judy Gold, Kevin McCaffrey, and Brendon Walsh.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 8
programme.desc: Join the festivities with 20 of the most pinheaded partiers ever to make the scene. From wild bachelorettes to a drunk Santa and more than you ever wanted to know about butt chugging. With crazy commentary from Danny Bonaduce and our celebrity cast,plus hot comics like Billy Kimball and Brendon Walsh.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 01
programme.desc: Michael breezes into the Windy City to shock and amaze the Chicago locals. In a health store, he sells a supplement that proves you are what you drink, and at a Metro station, he utterly derails a commuter's sense of reality.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 02
programme.desc: In a local Chicago diner, Michael brings new meaning to the term "hold the pickles." Plus, he discovers an aggressive new breed of fungus at a park, and later, he helps a coworker disappear from work early in a hospital warehouse.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 03
programme.desc: At a market, Michael reveals an amazing credit card hack, and at a science shop, he demonstrates how far stem cell research has come. Later, Michael spooks a gardener who's certain that angry gnomes are hunting him down!

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 04
programme.desc: Michael discovers a ferocious new breed of animal at a park, customers are steeped in confusion when Michael invades a local tea shop, and a woman gets her feathers ruffled when she realizes she's a witness to a transformation.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 05
programme.desc: Michael reveals the transformative properties of fruits and vegetables, and shows a caterer the true power of dairy products. Plus, an antique store customer is stunned when a species of termite literally chews through the scenery!

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S4 17
programme.desc: When the gang starts hanging out at Raj's and Sheldon realizes it's actually Leonard who is the center of their social group, Sheldon decides to get a new group of friends.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S4 18
programme.desc: Leonard must choose between his new girlfriend, Priya, and his friendship with Penny. Meanwhile, Howard drives Sheldon crazy with a magic trick.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S4 19
programme.desc: When someone hacks Sheldon's online gaming account, the guys go on a quest to find the culprit.

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: When Satan reneges on his plans to retire, two of his three heirs leave Hell for New York City to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Josh Brolin plays Jonah Hex, a scarred drifter and bounty hunter who can track down anyone...and anything. Having survived death, Jonah's violent history is steeped in myth and legend - leaving him with one foot in the natural world and one on the "other side." His only human connection is with Lilah (Transformers' Megan Fox), whose life in a brothel has left her with scars of her own. But Jonah's past is about to catch up with him when the U.S. military makes him an offer he can't refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must track down and stop the dangerous terrorist Quentin Turnbull (Oscar nominee John Malkovich). But Turnbull, who is gathering an army and preparing to unleash Hell, is also Jonah's oldest enemy and will stop at nothing until Jonah is dead. Based on the legendary graphic novel, this epic adventure thriller gives a new face to the comic book genre by combining the Western genre with supernatural elements.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 11
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin head to the casino to see if they can game the system with a high stakes dice-throwing hack, and they test some surprising hacks for overcoming snoring and sleeping through the night.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 1
programme.desc: Determined to do more than just recover his pandemic losses, Mark throws his energy into expanding one brand, investing in another, preparing mentally and physically for a new movie and turning 50.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 2
programme.desc: After meeting with prospective new Municipal brand partner Myles Garrett, Mark hits the links with the Flecha Azul team, and officially begins filming his new movie.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 7
programme.desc: Benny tries to become a hero to a Native American tribe.

programme.title: Miracle Workers S3 8
programme.desc: The wagon train attempts to cross the Blue Mountains, but Ezekiel worries their journey has been cursed by God. Meanwhile, Benny tries to make amends with Trig.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S4 20
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy experiment on their friends by spreading gossip, while Howard takes a big step in his relationship with Bernadette.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S4 21
programme.desc: Priya uses her lawyer skills to pick apart the roommate agreement...and put Sheldon in his place. Meanwhile, the girls take Sheldon dancing.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 17
programme.desc: While investigating a construction site death, Riggs struggles to rekindle his relationship with Molly, Murtaugh tries to make it right at home, and Trish's job is on the line.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 2
programme.desc: In this competitive episode Sal, Joe, Q, and Murr battle head-to-head in fierce Joker vs. Joker challenges! The guys go two-on-two as they conduct focus groups where they focus mostly on making things uncomfortable. They pitch fabulous and tasty mascot ideas to diehard baseball fans. Then, Joe and Q, break-it-down old-school-style at the mall. And finally, Sal and Murr face-off in a challenge that literally proves neither is book smart.

programme.desc: In this first episode, Samira journeys to places rarely seen by western audiences to reveal how the Persian Empire was born, the mysterious writing of its early people and how Iran's powerful kings built a vast empire that became the envy of the ancient world.

programme.title: Arctic Drift: A Year in the Ice S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The team endures through the extremes of Arctic winter close to the North Pole. Through the 24-hour darkness they work to revolutionise our ability to monitor sea ice using satellites, and they explore how the melting ice is releasing its own damaging greenhouse gases.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Zanzibar's Poison Monkey Ep8
programme.desc: Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungleand find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Fickle River Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Inside Story Ep4
programme.desc: Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Manzi the Superpack Ep6
programme.desc: Head back to the den with the Kakumbi, who are mourning the loss of two pups. Chance upon a hyena den and a lion pride trying to take down a buffalo, then catch up with the Manzi, who are in a standoff with a leopard and a herd of angry elephants.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - Winter is Coming Ep1
programme.desc: As soon as the days get cold and dark insects begin to disappear from the meadows and fields. Their sum and hum slowly fades away and will finally be gone. All animals have their special ways to survive winter. Migrating birds like swallows and cranes fly towards south, a lot of mammals like deer get a thick winter fur or hide away and sleep where its warm. But what do insects do? And why are they all back in spring?

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - Meadow of Horror Ep2
programme.desc: It is horror! It is murder! Brutal death as well as exciting fights with an exceptional last-minute rescue. And after seeing it you will know the creepiest spot is actually the meadow in your neighborhood. With stylistic devices from the horror genre this extraordinary nature documentary takes you on a journey following a well-known hero with six legs, red wings and seven black dots through a seemingly normal meadow but full of monsters.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Africa's Baboons Ep7
programme.desc: The baboon is one of the worlds most successful and dominant primates. Ranging throughout Africa, we explore how these fascinating animals have adapted to thrive in mountains, deserts, along the shores of acidic lakes, and even on the edge of a mighty ocean.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Zanzibar's Poison Monkey Ep8
programme.desc: Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungleand find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: Macro Worlds 1 - God's Darling: Beetles Ep3
programme.desc: Beetles have inhabited the Earth for more than 240 million years. There are around 380,000 kinds of beetles known to scientists and every year hundreds of new species are discovered. One fourth of the worlds animals are beetles. They have conquered almost every corner and every habitat on the planet and they have survived every global disaster. What is it that makes them so successful?

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - Crossing the Danakil Ep1
programme.desc: The Danakil Depression in Ethiopia is not only one of the most inhospitable places on Earth, but is one of the most geologically active. Now, volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer is taking a group of adventure tourists to cross the Danakil to see the Erte Ale volcano.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Foxes Ep1
programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Child of Fire Ep2
programme.desc: For volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer, any volcanic activity that happens in Indonesia is of interest due to its location of the largest eruption in modern history--Krakatoa. Now, Anak, a son of Krakatoa, appears to be going into a more violent phase so Tom heads to Indonesia to see if the Child of Fire is ready to repeat the pattern of its ancestor.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - How to Catch a Lizard Ep1
programme.desc: Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlottes tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Carnivores of the Coral Garden Ep1
programme.desc: The seas are alive with carnivores. Meet the sharks and rays who patrol the coral reefs, hunting down their prey. Learn about toxic fish who disguise themselves to ambush the unwary, and armoured predators who devour vulnerable targets.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Strength in Sisterhood Ep2
programme.desc: The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Zanzibar's Poison Monkey Ep8
programme.desc: Off the coast of Tanzania, baby Kima lives with his family of red Colobus monkeys. But what happens when he loses his way? Discover how this little monkey learns to adapt to life in the jungleand find out if he can reconnect with his family again.

programme.title: Deep in the Heart
programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star States landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas unique habitats.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - May-June - a Time of Volatility Ep3
programme.desc: Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 1 - The Gates of Hell Ep3
